sentences.cn: 能力是升职的先决条件。

sentences.en: He questioned the competence of the government.
sentences.cn: 他质疑政府的执政能力。

sentences.en: He stood out in terms of competence from all his fellows.
sentences.cn: 他在能力上远远胜过其他同事。

sentences.en: His competence as an economist had been reinforced by his successful fight against inflation.
sentences.cn: 成功地扼制制通货膨胀的经历加强了他作为经济学家的才能。

sentences.en: I have gravedoubts about his competence.
sentences.cn: 我对他的能力有很大怀疑.

sentences.en: One factor is the relative competence of the courts and the agencies.
sentences.cn: 原因之一是法院和行政机关的相对胜任能力.

sentences.en: Techanical competence is established within the first few years on the job.
sentences.cn: 技术才能是在工作最初几年中培养出来的.

sentences.en: The ability to write is a supreme test of linguistic competence.
sentences.cn: 写作能力是对语言能力的最高形式的测试.

sentences.en: The selection process is based on rigorous tests of competence and experience.
sentences.cn: 选拔过程是基于对能力和经验的严格测试。

sentences.en: The young surgeon showed exceptional competence.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的外科医生具有不寻常的才干.

sentences.en: These are matters within the competence of the court.
sentences.cn: 这些是法院权限以内的事.

sentences.en: This mess is a poor reflection on his competence.
sentences.cn: 这种混乱情况说明他难当此任.

sentences.en: to gain a high level of competence in English
sentences.cn: 获得高水平的英语能力

sentences.en: Training is a prerequisite for competence.
sentences.cn: 接受训练是掌握技能的前提.

sentences.en: Typing is considered by most employers to be a basic competence.
sentences.cn: 大多数雇主认为打字是一项基本技能。

sentences.en: We knew her competence in solving problems.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道她解决问题的能力.

sentences.en: We've always regarded him as a man of integrity and high professional competence.
sentences.cn: 我们一直都认为他是个正直而且业务能力很强的人。

words.tran_cn: 胜任的；有能力的；能干的；足够的
能力，[胚]胜任；权限；作证能力；足以过舒适生活的收入

phrases.tran_cn: 能力模型；胜任能力模型

trans.tran_en: the ability to do something well
